item.title: ... and All I Asked for Was a Pin
item.description: Way back in the old days, you know when VMworld 2012 was held in San Francisco, I tweeted that if someone could get hold of a VCP pin for me, I would be very happy. Luckily Paul Valentino from vCommunity TrustÂ picked that up, and apparently went on quite the scavenger hunt on my behalf. Imagine my surprise today when this little square meter of carton appeared, courtesy of Mr. Valentino:
